name: Egg Curry (Bittara Curry)
description: Hard-boiled eggs in rich coconut gravy
instructions: Peel and halve the boiled eggs
Lightly fry eggs until golden, set aside
In same pan, sauté onions and garlic
Gently add eggs to the gravy
Garnish with curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
cultural_notes: Popular breakfast curry, often eaten with bread or roti Hard-boil eggs and lightly fry them before adding to curry for better texture and color. This is the traditional village method.
description_sinhala: පොහොසත් පොල් හොදි වල තදින් තම්බා බිත්තර
description_tamil: வளமான தேங்காய் குழம்பில் கடின வேகவைத்த முட்டைகள்
cultural_notes_sinhala: ජනප්‍රිය උදෑසන ආහාර ව්‍යංජනය, බොහෝ විට පාන් හෝ රොටි සමඟ අනුභව කරනු ලැබේ
cultural_notes_tamil: பிரபலமான காலை உணவு கறி, அடிக்கடி ரொட்டி அல்லது ரொட்டியுடன் உண்ணப்படுகிறது
